name: Home Designer - Home Sweet Home
description:
Help Hazel to renovate a Living Room, Bedroom, Study and Dining Room with real world furniture! Play lots of hidden object games and loads of mini games. Earn money to be able to buy nice furniture to renovate the rooms. Decorate with hundreds of furniture pieces and learn fun facts at the same time.

- Redesign fabulous living spaces
- Over 400 real world furniture items
- Play 25 different game modes
- Learn fun-facts about being a real designer!
- Fun hidden objects scenes and mini games
